title: Ashley Tisdale Leaves a Mean Mom Group
summary: Ashley Tisdale is a famous singer and actress who was in High School Musical. She is a mom to two young daughters. She joined a group of other moms to get support and make friends. But the group started to act mean, like in high school. Some moms left her out and did not include her in activities. This made Ashley feel sad and alone. She decided to leave the group because it was not nice anymore. She told the other moms that their behavior was like high school and she did not want to be part of it. Ashley learned that it is important to have friends who are kind and supportive. She wants other moms to know they should not stay in groups that make them feel bad.

background_read: Ashley Tisdale is a famous person who became well-known as a child star on Disney Channel and in movies like High School Musical. She is now a mom to two daughters. Many moms join groups to share advice and support each other, but sometimes these groups can become unkind, making people feel left out, just like cliques in school. Ashley's story shows that it's okay to walk away from friendships that aren't healthy.
